# Version History

## v1.0.2
Flashlight and Pro-Flashlight were switched and using the wrong config values. This patch fixes that.

## v1.0.1
Added support for:
- Laser Pointer
- Boombox
Adjusted a few default config values.

## v1.0.0
Inital mod creation.
Features:
- Increase battery life of a few battery operated items.
	- Flashlight
	- Pro-Flashlight
	- Jetpack
	- Zap gun
	- Walkie-Talkie
